description: Access your iTerm session and control terminal commands seamlessly.

nodeVersion.description: Ensure Node version 18 or greater is installed.

capabilities.name: write_to_terminal
capabilities.description: Writes text to the active iTerm terminal - often used to run a command in the terminal

capabilities.name: read_terminal_output
capabilities.description: Reads the output from the active iTerm terminal

capabilities.name: send_control_character
capabilities.description: Sends a control character to the active iTerm terminal (e.g., Control-C)
